${modID}:ExampleCard.NAME: Name
${modID}:ExampleCard.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: This will automatically be used if the card is upgraded. Remove it if unneeded.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: You can put more text in here.
If you need to use it for stuff.
Blizzard is a good example for this.

${modID}:DaggerOfBahamut.NAME: Dagger Of Bahamut
${modID}:DaggerOfBahamut.DESCRIPTION: Forge the Dagger Of Bahamut. NL (+1 Strength at battle start)
${modID}:DaggerOfBahamut.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Forge the Dagger Of Bahamut Coda. NL (+2 Strength at battle start and +4 Max HP)

${modID}:SwordOfBahamut.NAME: Sword Of Bahamut
${modID}:SwordOfBahamut.DESCRIPTION: Forge the Sword Of Bahamut. NL (+1 Dexterity at battle start)
${modID}:SwordOfBahamut.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Forge the Sword Of Bahamut Coda. NL (+2 Dexterity at battle start and +4 Max HP)

${modID}:StaffOfBahamut.NAME: Staff Of Bahamut
${modID}:StaffOfBahamut.DESCRIPTION: Forge the Staff Of Bahamut. NL (+1 Focus at battle start)
${modID}:StaffOfBahamut.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Forge the Staff Of Bahamut Coda. NL (+2 Focus at battle start and +4 Max HP)

${modID}:HarpOfBahamut.NAME: Harp Of Bahamut
${modID}:HarpOfBahamut.DESCRIPTION: Forge the Harp Of Bahamut. NL (Get Miracle at battle start)
${modID}:HarpOfBahamut.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Forge the Harp Of Bahamut Coda. NL (Get Miracle+ at battle start and +4 Max HP)

${modID}:TiamatOmega.NAME: Tiamat Omega
${modID}:TiamatOmega.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to all enemies. NL Apply !M! Weak.

${modID}:ColossusOmega.NAME: Colossus Omega
${modID}:ColossusOmega.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to all enemies. NL Grain !B! Block.

${modID}:LeviathanOmega.NAME: Leviathan Omega
${modID}:LeviathanOmega.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to all enemies. NL Apply !M! Vulnerable.

${modID}:YggdrasilOmega.NAME: Yggdrasil Omega
${modID}:YggdrasilOmega.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to all enemies. NL Randomly do 1, repeat !M! times: NL 1) Gain 1 Temporary Strength NL 2) Gain 1 Temporary Dexterity.

${modID}:LuminieraOmega.NAME: Luminiera Omega
${modID}:LuminieraOmega.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If target has 1 or more Strength and/or Dexterity, remove it.

${modID}:CelesteOmega.NAME: Celeste Omega
${modID}:CelesteOmega.DESCRIPTION: Remove target's Block. NL Deal of it half as damage. NL

${modID}:ShivaCall.NAME: Shiva's Call
${modID}:ShivaCall.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Grain !M! Vigor. NL Exhaust

${modID}:EuropaCall.NAME: Europa's Call
${modID}:EuropaCall.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Heal !M! HP. NL Exhaust

${modID}:AlexielCall.NAME: Alexiel's Call
${modID}:AlexielCall.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Intangible. NL Grain !B! Block. NL Exhaust

${modID}:GrimnirCall.NAME: Grimnir's Call
${modID}:GrimnirCall.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Grain !B! Block. NL Exhaust
